description.en: A compact single-strap sling bag designed for daily carry. Features a quick-access front zipper pocket, roomy main compartment, and breathable back panel for comfort. Ideal for phone, wallet, passport, and small essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pocket layout, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 日常单肩斜挎胸包，适合通勤与出行随身携带。前置拉链快取口袋，主仓容量充足，背面透气背板提升舒适度。可放手机、钱包、护照与随身小物。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背板：透气网布 + 衬垫（可定制）
背带：可调节单肩背带（可定制）
五金：扣具/D 环等（可定制）

en.Pockets: Front zip pocket + main compartment + inner pocket (optional)
en.Use Case: Daily essentials, travel organizer, city walk
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 高 30–38cm × 宽 16–22cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.口袋结构: 前拉链袋 + 主仓 + 内袋（可选）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、旅行收纳、城市出行
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
